As an AI language model, I cannot make specific product recommendations but here are some general tips to help you in choosing a facial exfoliator that can help with acne and fine lines:

1. Look for an exfoliator that contains salicylic acid, a gentle beta-hydroxy acid that can help unclog pores and prevent acne.

2. Consider using an exfoliator that contains glycolic or lactic acid, alpha-hydroxy acids that can help minimize the appearance of fine lines and improve overall skin texture.

3. Choose an exfoliator that is gentle and non-abrasive, as over-exfoliation can lead to irritation and damage to the skin.

4. Avoid exfoliators that contain physical exfoliants such as nut shells, which can cause micro-tears in the skin and exacerbate acne and fine lines.

It's important to patch test a new product before use to make sure it's suitable for your skin type and to follow the instructions for use carefully. You may also want to consult with a dermatologist to help you choose the right product for your unique skin concerns.
